summary: LeftSidebar was updated to add a hamburger toggle button left of the Fourleaf brand, introduce a collapsed desktop width with smooth transitions and reduced-motion fallbacks, and add ARIA attributes to the toggle. However, the diff summary does not show the requested update to the hamburger SVG asset styling, and some additional/unrequested project/meta files were modified.
